p: Analogous to the linear regression model, the same independent variables and the same variable selection criterion were used in the logistic regression model. The group carriers of virus controlled was statistically significant ( P=0.0379) and ( P=0.0138) for patients with the uncontrolled virus). The model also includes the variables optic disc excavation of OD ( P=0.1336) and OD Paquimetry ( P=0.0972). The value of the Nagelkerke R 2 for this model was 0.096.
